title: Great find! 3 bed/ 2 Bath Rent-to-Own Available
posting_body: Don't let hefty down payments and processing fees keep you from entering the real estate market.
Here is a family home with updated features that you must-see.
The house plan includes 3 well-lit bedrooms and 2 bathrooms.
The spacious finished basement can always be converted into a room.
The property also boasts of a private parking spot.
The exteriors - the fresh colors, manicured gardens and landscaping are sure to draw your attention.
We help people with poor FICO and credit scores buy their dream home!
Contact us by clicking on the reply button.
